title: Placement Date Rule #1.05 - Placement Date must not be before the first day of club's season or after the last day of club's season, including the post season
custom_preconds:
Business Rules: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/EBIS4-BR-903+1.+Verify+DL+Placement+Date
Error Messages: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/DL+-+Messages
GIVEN [C1045084] has been completed and passed
AND BOC user has performed advanced search for MJ league player 
AND BOC user has opened the player's Pro Player Profile from advanced search 
AND BOC user has completed [C1047211]
AND BOC user is attempting to execute [C1047212]
AND BOC user has entered a Placement Date that is before the beginning of the player's club's season, or after the end of the player's club's season (based on club system dates screen)
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user clicks Submit on the 7 Day Concussion DL transaction
custom_expected:
THEN user sees error message #5 "The player must be placed between the open and closing date of the season, from {0} to {1}."

AND "Back" and "Ignore and Continue" buttons will be available on the error modal
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction

Business Rules: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/EBIS4-BR-903+1.+Verify+DL+Placement+Date
Error Messages: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/DL+-+Messages
GIVEN [C1045084] has been completed and passed
AND BOC user has performed advanced search for MJ league player 
AND BOC user has opened the player's Pro Player Profile from advanced search 
AND BOC user has completed [C1047211]
AND BOC user is attempting to execute [C1047212]
AND BOC user has entered a Injury Date that is in the future
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user clicks Submit on the 7 Day Concussion DL transaction
custom_expected:
THEN user sees error message #11 "Injury Date must not be a future date."
AND "Back" and "Ignore and Continue" buttons will be available on the error modal
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction

title: Rule #4.03 - The player's current club's level of play must be Major League
custom_preconds:

AND BOC user has performed advanced search for MJ league player 
AND BOC user has opened the player's Pro Player Profile from advanced search 
AND BOC user has completed [C1047211]
AND BOC user has saved the new 7 Day Concussion DL tx as preliminary
AND BOC user has subsequently optioned or MJ/MN outrighted the player to MN League 
AND BOC user has navigated back to PPP and completed [C1047211] again

custom_expected:

AND only "Back" button should be available on error modal
AND clicking "Back" should return user to the Form
